SEARCH
Package ComparativeGenomics.FileHandling.DataHandling

Class Chromosome

java.lang.Object
ComparativeGenomics.FileHandling.DataHandling.Chromosome
public class Chromosome extends Object
Combines the CmapData, XmapData, annotations (gene), structural variants and context of the chromosome within a genom
Author:
franpeters

  • Constructor Details

    • Chromosome

      public Chromosome(String name, CmapData cmap, Double relsize, Sequence seq, ArrayList<Gene> genes)
      Constructor of class Chromosome
      Parameters:
      name - Chromosome name
      cmap - Cmap data for the considered chromosome
      relsize - Relative size of the chromosome
      seq - Sequence of the chromosome
      genes - List of genes on the chromosome

  • Method Details

    • setAlignment

      public void setAlignment(ArrayList<XmapData> map, Cmap qryCmap)
      Sets new alignment: adds the alignment file to the chromosome object
      Parameters:
      map - ArrayList of XmapData (corresponding to one line of an XMAP file)
      qryCmap - CMAP data of the query
